verses.verse: Now Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "Get out <S%H3212><s%> of your country, <S%H776><s%> and from your relatives, <S%H4138><s%> and from your father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> that I will show you. <S%H7200><s%>

I will make of you <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you and make <S%H1431><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> great. <S%H1431><s%> You will be a blessing. <S%H1293><s%>

I will bless <S%H1288><s%> those who bless <S%H1288><s%> you, <S%H779><s%> and I will curse him who curses <S%H779><s%> you. <S%H4940><s%> All of the families of the earth <S%H127><s%> will be blessed in you. <S%H1288><s%>"

So Abram <S%H87><s%> went, <S%H3212><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him. <S%H3876><s%> Lot went <S%H3212><s%> with him. <S%H87><s%> Abram was seventy <S%H7657><s%>- five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he departed <S%H3318><s%> out of Haran. <S%H2771><s%>

Abram <S%H87><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> all their substance <S%H7399><s%> that they had gathered, <S%H7408><s%> and the souls <S%H5315><s%> whom they had gotten <S%H6213><s%> in Haran, <S%H2771><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> Into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> they came. <S%H935><s%>

Abram <S%H87><s%> passed through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> to the oak <S%H436><s%> of Moreh. <S%H4176><s%> The Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I will give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to your seed. <S%H2233><s%>" He built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who appeared to him. <S%H7200><s%>

He left <S%H6275><s%> from there to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent, <S%H168><s%> having Bethel <S%H1008><s%> on the west, <S%H3220><s%> and Ai <S%H5857><s%> on the east. <S%H6924><s%> There he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Abram <S%H87><s%> traveled, <S%H5265><s%> going on <S%H1980><s%> still <S%H5265><s%> toward the South. <S%H5045><s%>

There was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to live <S%H1481><s%> as a foreigner there, <S%H7458><s%> for the famine was severe <S%H3515><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

It happened, <S%H834><s%> when he had come near <S%H7126><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that he said <S%H559><s%> to Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> "See <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you are a beautiful <S%H3303><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> to look at. <S%H4758><s%>

It will happen, <S%H4713><s%> when the Egyptians will see <S%H7200><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> that they will say, <S%H802><s%> 'This is his wife.' They will kill <S%H2026><s%> me, <S%H2421><s%> but they will save you alive.

Please say <S%H559><s%> that you <S%H4994><s%> are my sister, <S%H269><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with me for your sake, <S%H5315><s%> and that my soul may live <S%H2421><s%> because of you. <S%H1558><s%>"

It happened that when Abram <S%H87><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the woman <S%H802><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> beautiful. <S%H3303><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> her, <S%H1984><s%> and praised her to <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and the woman <S%H802><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> into Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>

He dealt <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> with Abram <S%H87><s%> for her sake. <S%H6629><s%> He had sheep, cattle, <S%H1241><s%> male donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> male servants, <S%H5650><s%> female servants, <S%H8198><s%> female donkeys, <S%H860><s%> and camels. <S%H1581><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> plagued <S%H5060><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H5061><s%> because of <S%H1697><s%> Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife. <S%H802><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "What is this that you have done <S%H6213><s%> to me? <S%H5046><s%> Why didn't you tell me that she was your wife? <S%H802><s%>

Why did you <S%H559><s%> say, <S%H269><s%> 'She is my sister,' so that I took <S%H3947><s%> her to be my wife? <S%H802><s%> Now therefore, <S%H802><s%> see your wife, take <S%H3947><s%> her, <S%H3212><s%> and go your way."
Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> men <S%H582><s%> concerning him, <S%H7971><s%> and they brought him on the way with his wife and all that he had. <S%H802><s%>
